calls.customer_input: Hi, my water was shut off yesterday for repairs on my street, but it still hasn't been turned back on. Can someone come restore my service?
Our water was cut off due to construction and the crew left without turning it back on. We have small children and need water restored immediately.
The water department shut off my water this morning to fix a leak, but it's been 8 hours and it's still not back on.
There's water coming from the vacant property next door and it's flooding my basement. The house has been abandoned for years.
I need to report an abandoned property that has a major leak. Water is pouring out and flooding the sidewalk.
I think my automatic meter reader is broken. My usage shows 10,000 gallons this month but I live alone and was on vacation for two weeks.
Can someone check my water meter? The digital display is completely blank and I can't read it.
My meter reading seems way off. There's no way I used that much water last month.
I just got my bill and it's $300 higher than normal! There must be some mistake.
I paid my water bill last week but it's still showing as unpaid online. Can you check if my payment was received?
I need to set up a payment plan for my water bill. I lost my job and can't pay the full amount right now.
There's a pipe burst in my basement and water is gushing everywhere! I can't find the shutoff valve and water is filling up fast!
A pipe just burst on my street and there's water shooting 10 feet in the air! The whole road is flooding!
My water main broke and I can't shut it off. The valve seems to be stuck and water is pouring into my yard.
My tap water smells like rotten eggs. Is it safe to drink?
The water from my faucet tastes metallic and has a strange odor. It just started happening yesterday.
There's something wrong with my water. It has a strong chlorine smell that's burning my nose when I shower.
There's a sinkhole forming in front of my house. It started small but it's getting bigger every day.
The street is caving in near the storm drain on my corner. I think there might be a broken pipe underneath.
I noticed a depression forming in my yard right above where I think the water line runs. The ground is sinking about 6 inches.
The water department fixed a leak on my property two months ago but never came back to repair the sidewalk. There's still just gravel there.
Your crew dug up my driveway to access a water line and left a big patch of dirt. When will someone come pour new concrete?
After the pipe repair last week, the temporary asphalt patch is already crumbling. We need a proper cement repair.
The storm drain on our street is completely blocked with debris and the whole block floods when it rains.
There's a drain that's clogged near the intersection of Maple and 5th. It's causing a huge puddle that cars can't avoid.
The sewer drain in front of my house is backed up. Water isn't draining and there's a terrible smell.
A water main broke and flooded my basement last week. I lost my washer, dryer, and everything stored down there. How do I file a claim?
Your crew damaged my garden when they were digging to fix a pipe. I want to be compensated for the plants that were destroyed.
My car was parked on the street when your water line burst. The water damaged the engine and now it won't start. I need to file a claim.
I heard the water department gives away free compost. How can I get some for my community garden?
When is the next compost giveaway? I missed the last one and really want some for my vegetable garden.
I just paid my overdue bill and was told my water would be turned back on today, but it's still off. Can you help?
The water department was working on my neighbor's line and accidentally shut off my water too. It needs to be restored.
There's a condemned building on my block with a major water leak. It's been running for days and nobody's doing anything about it.
I think my automatic meter might be double-counting. My bill says I'm using twice as much water as last year with no change in my habits.
My meter is making a strange buzzing noise. Is that normal or does it need to be replaced?
I need an extension on my bill payment. Can I get an extra two weeks before it's considered late?
I think I qualify for the senior citizen discount on my water bill. How do I apply for that?
I got a notice saying my water will be shut off for non-payment, but I never received a bill in the first place!
There's a fire hydrant that was hit by a car and now water is spraying everywhere. The whole street is flooded!
A pipe just burst outside my restaurant and I can't shut it off. We have customers inside and water is coming in the front door!
My water suddenly has a strong chemical smell and taste. It's making my children feel sick when they drink it.
There's something brown coming out of my faucet and the water smells like dirt. Is there a problem with the water supply?
Part of my driveway is sinking in and I can hear water running underneath. I think there might be a leaking pipe causing erosion.
There's a huge depression forming in the middle of our street. Cars have to drive around it and it's getting deeper every day.
After your crew fixed the water main, they filled in the hole with dirt but never repaved the street. It's been three weeks.
The temporary patch your team put in my yard after fixing a pipe is washing away with the rain. When will it be permanently fixed?
There's a storm drain at the end of my street that's completely blocked with leaves. Every time it rains the intersection floods.
The drain in the alley behind my house is clogged and causing sewage to back up. It smells horrible and is a health hazard.
Your maintenance crew broke my fence when they were accessing the water meter. I want to file a claim for the repair cost.
The water department's truck backed into my mailbox and destroyed it. How do I get reimbursed for the replacement?
I'm starting a school garden project and heard the water department provides free compost. Can we arrange a pickup?
My water was shut off for non-payment, but I just made a payment at the office. How soon can I get my service restored?
The fire department responded to a flooded basement at an empty house on my street. They said I should call you about getting the water shut off.
I'm getting estimated bills because my automatic meter reader isn't working. Can someone come replace it so I get accurate bills?
I received two different bills for the same service period. Which one is correct and which should I pay?
I'm selling my house next week. How do I transfer the water account to the new owners?
My water heater just ruptured and water is pouring out. I can't find the main shutoff valve for my house!
My water suddenly has a strong sulfur smell. Is this related to the construction work happening on our street?
There's a soft spot in the road that cars keep sinking into. I think there might be a water leak underground causing it.
The water department dug up my lawn to fix a pipe six months ago. They said they'd replace the sod but never did.
After yesterday's storm, the drain on our corner is totally blocked and there's standing water covering half the block.
Your water main break flooded my first floor and ruined all my hardwood flooring. I need to file a claim for damages.
Do you still give away compost made from water treatment byproducts? I'd like some for my organic garden.
There was emergency work on my street yesterday and they shut off our water. Everyone else's is back on except mine.
There's an abandoned house on my block with broken pipes. Water has been running out of it for three days straight.
I got a notice saying my meter couldn't be read remotely. Do I need a new meter or is there something blocking the signal?
I've been getting bills for a property I sold two years ago. How do I remove my name from this account?
A construction crew just hit a water main on my street. Water is shooting up like a geyser and flooding everything!
My water has started to taste like plastic. Is this related to the new pipes that were installed last month?
I noticed the ground is sinking around a fire hydrant near my house. It looks like it might be undermined.
Your crew fixed a water line and patched my sidewalk, but the cement is already cracking after just two weeks.
The storm drain on Oak Street is completely filled with construction debris. It's not draining at all when it rains.
During your repair work, a worker broke my sprinkler system. I had it fixed but want to be reimbursed for the cost.
I run a community garden and we could use some compost. Does the water department still donate compost to community projects?
I just moved into a new apartment and need to get the water turned on. The landlord said to call you directly.
There's a foreclosed home that has water pouring out from under the front door. It's creating ice on the sidewalk in this cold weather.
The digital display on my water meter is flashing an error code. What does 'ERR-4' mean?
I want to sign up for electronic billing instead of paper bills. How do I make that change?
I have a major pipe burst in my ceiling and water is pouring through the light fixtures! I can't find the water shutoff!
My water has a strong earthy taste all of a sudden. Is this happening to other people in my neighborhood?
There's a big depression forming in my front yard right over where I think the water line runs. The grass is sinking about a foot.
After replacing a fire hydrant on my corner, your crew left a big patch of gravel. When will the sidewalk be properly restored?
There's a drain on Center Street that bubbles up sewage every time it rains heavily. It's creating a serious health hazard.
Your crew left the water on while working on my pipes, which led to a flood in my kitchen. I want to file a claim for the cabinet damage.
I heard you give away compost in the spring. Is there a waiting list I can get on for the next distribution?
My water was turned off because of an emergency repair on my street yesterday. The crew said it would be back on by evening, but it's still off.
There's a vacant building with a major leak that's causing water to flow down the street. It's been like this for a week.
I got a notice saying my water usage is 300% above normal. I think my automatic meter reader must be malfunctioning.
I'm on a fixed income and my water bill has doubled. Is there an assistance program I can apply for?
A truck just hit the fire hydrant in front of my business and water is shooting everywhere! My parking lot is completely flooded!
My tap water suddenly has a strong chlorine smell and taste. It's so strong it burns my throat when I drink it.
There's a sinkhole forming in the middle of Pine Street. It started small but now it's about three feet wide and getting deeper.
The water department replaced a valve in front of my house but left a dirt patch in my lawn. When will you come back to fix it?
The catch basin at the corner of 4th and Main is completely clogged. The whole intersection floods when it rains just a little bit.
The water pressure surge after a main repair damaged my washing machine. How do I file a claim for the repair costs?
I'm working with a school to start a garden. Can the water department donate some compost for this educational project?
My water was shut off for a scheduled repair this morning. The crew has left but my water is still not turned back on.
I just got a shutoff notice but I never received my original bill. There must be a problem with mail delivery.
There's a water main break on Elm Street! Water is gushing out of the pavement and flooding several homes including mine!
